name: Create a new record in Airtable from a Google Ads Lead Forms submission
description:
Please disable your ad blockers when working with our Google Ads apps. The ad blockers may cause unexpected behavior.

Every time a new Google Ads Lead form is submitted, a new record will be created in Airtable.

The template expects your lead form to collect at least these fields:
1) Full Name
2) User Email
3) User Phone

The template expects your Airtable table to have the following columns:
1) Full Name
2) User Email
3) User Phone
